ing: 1/3 cup granular no-calorie sucralose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®) (optional)
n: Slow Cooker Chocolate Banana Steel Cut Oats
des: "Just another way for oatmeal to be enjoyed! Makes plenty of leftovers to freeze for later."
ins:
Lightly spray a 5-quart or larger slow cooker crock with cooking spray.
Mix water, oats, mashed bananas, cocoa powder, and sweetener in prepared slow cooker.
Cook on Low for 6 hours.
